long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a password generator. You can use this password generator to generate extremely unique and secure passwords. You can even control the length of the passwords for example 16 characters or 19 characters but the length should be between 7 characters and 20 characters. You can even select if you want uppercase letters, symbols, and numbers in the password. For more information, you can see the phone screenshots. Thank you! I hope you like this app!!
